description: Repository layer for appointment data management with comprehensive CRUD operations and business logic

components.AppointmentsRepository: Deprecated wrapper repository delegating to DriftAppointmentRepository with error handling and logging.

rules: Deprecated repository wrapper maintaining backward compatibility during migration to direct Drift usage.
Singleton pattern ensuring single instance across application for consistent data access.
Comprehensive error logging with stack traces for all appointment operations.
Delegation pattern forwarding all operations to DriftAppointmentRepository.instance.
Today's appointments retrieval with calendar-specific filtering for different view contexts.
Upcoming appointments with configurable limit for dashboard and preview displays.
Appointment CRUD operations: get by ID, create, update status, reschedule, cancel.
Check-in functionality specifically for appointment arrival workflow.
Time slot availability checking with conflict detection and exclusion support.
Appointment statistics aggregation with date and employee filtering for reporting.
Notes management with dedicated update method for appointment annotations.
Technician reassignment functionality for appointment management flexibility.
Duration updates supporting appointment time modifications and extensions.
Deprecated method implementation with clear guidance toward specific replacement methods.
Consistent error handling pattern returning empty results rather than throwing exceptions for read operations.
Rethrow pattern for write operations ensuring proper error propagation to calling code.
Comprehensive appointment lifecycle management from creation to completion.
Business logic abstraction layer providing clean API for presentation layer consumption.
